titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to authorize the use of rights-of-way along Federal-aid highways for the construction of transportation systems that will be part of the Federal-aid highway system.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 2/18/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations allowing the States to use rights-of-way along Federal-aid highways for the construction of magnetic levitation systems as part of the Federal-aid highway system.
